Name: World Fighting Soccer 22
About the game: Experience the thrill of head to head Soccer! Compete in Local Multiplayer or a Single Player Campaign Mode to decide the world's greatest striker! A simple control scheme and exciting presentation ensures that everyone can experience the thrill of the Beautiful Game. Trap, pass, fly through the air, and strike! All with the press of a button! Execute combos that'll leave defenders speechless and fight your way to the top! Features Versus Mode: Compete in head to head local multiplayer or against CPU opponents Campaign mode: Win a series of single player matches and face an unforgiving final encounter Training mode: Hone your skills and combos at your own pace in an open field 32 unique teams from around the world 3 stages with various settings Notes Platform supported: Windows 7+ Input supported: Xinput (Xbox One/Series Controller recommended), Keyboard
